rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示了医疗补助放松后的覆盖差距和医疗服务挑战在对阿肯色州、肯塔基州、路易斯安那州和德克萨斯州低收入成年人的一项调查中，自 2020 年 3 月以来的某个时间点加入医疗补助的受访者中，八分之一的受访者表示，到 2023 年底，他们将不再享受医疗补助，其中近一半的人报告称不再享受医疗补助根据哈佛大学陈曾熙公共卫生学院的一项研究，目前没有保险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240629/Study-reveals-coverage-gaps-and-health-access-challenges-post-Medicaid-unwinding.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240629/Study-reveals-coverage-gaps-and-health-access-challenges-post-Medicaid-unwinding.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3078e09a-ebf0-4d9d-8928-efc655f0929c Sat, 29 Jun 2024 21:38:16 -0400 Study reveals coverage gaps and health access challenges post-Medicaid unwinding
孕前摄入钙和锌可降低妊娠期高血压疾病的风险最新研究表明，与那些必需矿物质摄入量较低的人相比，在怀孕前三个月内钙和锌摄入量较高的人在怀孕期间患高血压疾病的可能性显着降低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240629/Preconception-intake-of-calcium-and-zinc-linked-to-lower-risk-of-hypertential-disorders-of-pregnancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240629/Preconception-intake-of-calcium-and-zinc-linked-to-lower-risk-of-hypertential-disorders-of-pregnancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43d69f4e-05d2-4004-bf59-1a7f4520f5e1 Sat, 29 Jun 2024 21:32:04 -0400 Preconception intake of calcium and zinc linked to lower risk of hypertensive disorders of pregnancy
橄榄中发现的天然化合物可以降低血糖水平并促进减肥一项新的小鼠研究结果表明，橄榄中发现的天然化合物烯醇酸可以降低血糖水平并促进减肥。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240629/Natural-compound-found-in-olives-can-lower-blood-sugar-levels-and-promote-weight-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240629/Natural-compound-found-in-olives-can-lower-blood-sugar-levels-and-promote-weight-loss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2d55d2f-b9dc-43ad-9714-35e1f0ab5ea3 Sat, 29 Jun 2024 21:26:59 -0400 Natural compound found in olives can lower blood sugar levels and promote weight loss
父亲服用鱼油补充剂可能有助于对抗儿童肥胖一项在小鼠身上进行的研究发现了一种潜在的新工具，可以解决日益严重的儿童肥胖问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240629/Fish-oil-supplement-taken-by-fathers-may-help-combat-childhood-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240629/Fish-oil-supplement-taken-by-fathers-may-help-combat-childhood-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e3957633-8a3d-4e80-99e7-71730ca11bc8 Sat, 29 Jun 2024 21:24:58 -0400 Fish oil supplement taken by fathers may help combat childhood obesity
受蟒蛇牙启发的装置使肩袖修复强度加倍大多数人一想到蟒蛇，就会想象这条巨大的蛇将受害者整个包裹起来并吞下。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Python-tooth-inspired-device-doubles-strength-of-rotator-cuff-repairs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Python-tooth-inspired-device-doubles-strength-of-rotator-cuff-repairs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ebe0778d-81f5-4ab6-82bb-acc0db84ac04 Fri, 28 Jun 2024 23:58:11 -0400 Python tooth-inspired device doubles strength of rotator cuff repairs
研究表明，大脑中的血清素 2C 受体可调节人和动物模型的记忆英国贝勒医学院、英国剑桥大学及合作机构的研究人员表明，大脑中的血清素 2C 受体可调节人和动物模型的记忆。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Serotonin-2C-receptor-in-the-brain-regulates-memory-in-people-and-animal-models-research-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Serotonin-2C-receptor-in-the-brain-regulates-memory-in-people-and-animal-models-research-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6df58321-7d42-4a4b-8b42-b1c6d7451f91 Fri, 28 Jun 2024 23:51:59 -0400 Serotonin 2C receptor in the brain regulates memory in people and animal models, research shows
研究提醒跨性别女性谨慎解读标准前列腺癌筛查指南加州大学旧金山分校领导的研究提醒跨性别女性和医生谨慎解释标准筛查指南。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Study-alerts-transwomen-to-interpret-standard-prostate-cancer-screening-guidelines-with-caution.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Study-alerts-transwomen-to-interpret-standard-prostate-cancer-screening-guidelines-with-caution.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3a3349dd-12d0-40a9-abd2-b4d98eaea398 Fri, 28 Jun 2024 23:48:15 -0400 Study alerts transwomen to interpret standard prostate cancer screening guidelines with caution
莫菲特科学家开发出可大规模合成醉茄内酯的突破性方法睡茄内酯是一类在植物中发现的天然化合物，由于其能够抑制癌细胞生长、诱导细胞死亡和防止转移，长期以来一直是癌症研究的焦点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Moffitt-scientists-develop-breakthrough-method-for-scalable-synthesis-of-withanolides.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Moffitt-scientists-develop-breakthrough-method-for-scalable-synthesis-of-withanolides.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f390dedf-e157-44c5-8d76-9e6cd58232ee Fri, 28 Jun 2024 23:40:49 -0400 Moffitt scientists develop breakthrough method for scalable synthesis of withanolides
创新的痴呆症成本模型可帮助家庭并制定卫生政策来自南加州大学的一流研究人员正在建立一个痴呆症成本模型，该模型将生成全面的全国性年度痴呆症成本估计，这将使患者及其家人受益，这要归功于国家癌症研究所提供的为期五年、价值 820 万美元的联邦拨款老龄化研究所。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Innovative-dementia-cost-model-to-aid-families-and-shape-health-policy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/Innovative-dementia-cost-model-to-aid-families-and-shape-health-policy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c7c052a-1d0d-4840-9102-f95202c4f0e8 Fri, 28 Jun 2024 23:30:13 -0400 Innovative dementia cost model to aid families and shape health policy
前列腺癌 PET/CT 成像中 AI 驱动的病灶勾画2024 年 5 月 20 日，Oncoscience（第 11 卷）发表了一篇新的社论论文，题为“PET/CT 成像中的深度学习辅助病变分割：前列腺癌挽救性放射治疗的可行性研究”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/AI-powered-lesion-delineation-in-prostate-cancer-PETCT-imaging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240628/AI-powered-lesion-delineation-in-prostate-cancer-PETCT-imaging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1655e2a1-9d20-4d8a-bf17-af16c416daa4 Fri, 28 Jun 2024 23:23:49 -0400 AI-powered lesion delineation in prostate cancer PET/CT imaging
